Then, for each channel, I will read its messages using the `read_channel_messages` function and count the number of messages. 

After counting the messages in all channels, I will find the channel with the smallest number of messages.

Next, I will get a list of users in the Slack workspace. This can be done by calling the `get_users_in_channel` function for each channel and combining the results.

Then, I will compare the list of users in the Slack workspace with the list of users in the channel with the smallest number of messages. 

Finally, I will add all users who are not already in the channel to that channel using the `add_user_to_channel` function.
